p: In conclusion, the results of MTT assay of most of the new compounds revealed higher cytotoxicity compared to lapatinib (IC 50 = 6.77–12.46 μM). In addition, most of the new compounds ( 16a, 17a, 18b, c, 19a–c) exhibited higher cytotoxic activities against MCF-7 than the parent compound 10, Table 2.
